tossup_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three statements that are true regarding electromagnetism: 1) Dipoles experience a net force in a uniform electric field; 2) At a distance infinity, dipoles are equivalent to a neutral particle; 3) Dipoles experience a net force in a nonuniform electric field.
bonus_question: -   –   What scientist first discovered that a moving charge induces a magnetic field?
